name: PARTYCLES! (Trimblewick)
description:
Made in Unity for the HTC vive.

By Pontus Björkberg, Ivar Björling and Gustav Ekelund.

The controllers serve as wands that spawn particles. The wands also creates  forces, pulling particles towards them, when activated. The particles have a lifetime, so spawn a bunch and gather them before throwing them simultaneously.

A certain amount of stars need to be collected in order to progress through the game. Stars are awarded for finishing levels in a shorter time.
